thread.title: BRIT Awards 2017: Little Mix's 'shouty' opening performance SLATED by ITV viewers
thread.title_full: BRIT Awards 2017: Little Mix's 'shouty' opening performance SLATED by ITV viewers

title: BRIT Awards 2017: Little Mix's 'shouty' opening performance SLATED by ITV viewers
text:
BRIT Awards 2017: Little Mix performed their hit Shout Out To My Ex GETTY BRIT Awards 2017: Little Mix were slammed by those tuning in at home Little Mix sound like four girls who have got drunk in Tiger Tiger BRIT Awards 2017 viewer 
While another added: “@LittleMix @BRITs Yikes girls! Ik you can do better than this.”(sic) 
“Little Mix sound like four girls who have got drunk in Tiger Tiger and stumbled into a karaoke booth #screaming #BRITs2017,” a third slammed. 
Someone else continued: “They should have added the shouting in the actual single #BRITs2017 #LittleMixBRITs.” 
However, the girls did get some support from their fans, with one tweeting: “@BRITs @LittleMix queens slay the brits #BRITVOTELITTLEMIX.” PA BRIT Awards 2017: Jade Thirlwall struggled with a wardrobe malfunction on the red carpet Inside the BRIT Awards 2017 Wed, February 22, 2017
